document: PROCEDURES AS A REPRESENTATION FOR DATA IN A COMPUTER PROGRAM FOR UNDERSTANDING NATURAL LANGUAGE by Terry Winograd P.A., The Colorado College (1966) SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILLMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY at the MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY August, 1970 Signature of Author Department of Mathematics August 24, 1970 Certified by Thesis Supervisor Accepted by Chairman, Departmental Committee on Graduate Students MASS.
